cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread allocation failure and prevent PUSCH processing initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP to a negative value will cause antenna port configuration error and downlink transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP 設定為負值會導致天線埠配置錯誤，並造成下行鏈路傳輸失敗。
